feed.title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon May 05 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 28 April 2025 through Monday, 5 May 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +0, -0

BCD Metadata Changes: 1

Show all 1 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (1)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 25 April 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ white-space ➞ shorthand_values
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

New entries (0)

No features were added to BCD in this time period.

Removed entries (0)

No features were removed from bcd in this time period
  • Previous report: Monday, 28 April 2025

BCD Watch: A service of

Subscribe: RSS • Atom • JSON

This report was generated by diffing v6.0.9 (Friday, 25 April 2025) and v6.0.11 (Friday, 2 May 2025)

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Apr 28 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 21 April 2025 through Monday, 28 April 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +3, -0

Support increases (3)

API

  1. api ➞ AudioWorkletGlobalScope ➞ port
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript ➞ statements ➞ import ➞ import_attributes
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. javascript ➞ statements ➞ import ➞ import_attributes ➞ type_json
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 7

Show all 7 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (4)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 18 April 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ Element ➞ attachShadow ➞ options_serializable_parameter
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ text-wrap-style ➞ pretty
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  2 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ browsingData ➞ RemovalOptions ➞ excludeOrigin
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ browsingData ➞ RemovalOptions ➞ origin
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

New entries (3)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 18 April 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api ➞ AudioWorkletGlobalScope ➞ port

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ browsingData ➞ RemovalOptions ➞ excludeOrigin
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ browsingData ➞ RemovalOptions ➞ origin

Removed entries (0)

No features were removed from bcd in this time period
  • Previous report: Monday, 21 April 2025

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Apr 21 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 14 April 2025 through Monday, 21 April 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +9, -0

Support increases (9)

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ script ➞ type ➞ importmap ➞ integrity
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation ➞ setGeolocationOverride
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ tabs ➞ Tab ➞ groupId
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ tabs ➞ group
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. webextensions ➞ api ➞ tabs ➞ onUpdated ➞ changeInfo ➞ groupId
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. webextensions ➞ api ➞ tabs ➞ onUpdated ➞ filter ➞ properties ➞ groupId
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. webextensions ➞ api ➞ tabs ➞ query ➞ queryInfo ➞ groupId
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  6. webextensions ➞ api ➞ tabs ➞ ungroup
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 32

Show all 32 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (11)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 11 April 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ PerformanceEventTiming ➞ interactionId
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ form ➞ autocomplete ➞ webauthn
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ accent-color ➞ maintains_contrast
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ types ➞ gradient ➞ repeating-conic-gradient ➞ single_color_stop
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ types ➞ gradient ➞ repeating-linear-gradient ➞ single_color_stop
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. css ➞ types ➞ gradient ➞ repeating-radial-gradient ➞ single_color_stop
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ FinalizationRegistry ➞ register ➞ symbol_as_target
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ FinalizationRegistry ➞ unregister ➞ symbol_as_target
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ WeakRef ➞ WeakRef ➞ symbol_as_target
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ browserAction ➞ getUserSettings
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ browserAction ➞ getUserSettings ➞ returns_userSettings_isOnToolbar_property
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

New entries (17)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 11 April 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ accent-color ➞ maintains_contrast
  2. css ➞ types ➞ gradient ➞ repeating-conic-gradient ➞ single_color_stop
  3. css ➞ types ➞ gradient ➞ repeating-linear-gradient ➞ single_color_stop
  4. css ➞ types ➞ gradient ➞ repeating-radial-gradient ➞ single_color_stop

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ FinalizationRegistry ➞ register ➞ symbol_as_target

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Apr 14 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 7 April 2025 through Monday, 14 April 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +4, -0

Support increases (4)

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ script ➞ type ➞ speculationrules ➞ tag
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Set-Login
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. http ➞ headers ➞ Sec-Speculation-Tags
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ Iterator ➞ Iterator
    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 191

Show all 191 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 4 April 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Apr 07 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 31 March 2025 through Monday, 7 April 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +30, -0

Support increases (30)

API

  1. api ➞ Navigator ➞ login
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ NavigatorLogin
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ NavigatorLogin ➞ setStatus
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ Notification ➞ maxActions_static
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ RTCCertificate ➞ getFingerprints
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ RTCRtpSender ➞ getParameters ➞ return_object_property_degradationPreference (⚠️ deprecated)
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ RTCRtpSender ➞ setParameters ➞ parameters_degradationPreference_parameter (⚠️ deprecated)
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  8. api ➞ SVGAElement ➞ rel
    Added to Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  9. api ➞ SVGAElement ➞ relList
    Added to Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  10. api ➞ SVGGeometryElement ➞ isPointInFill ➞ point_parameter_DOMPoint
    Added to Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  11. api ➞ SVGGeometryElement ➞ isPointInStroke ➞ point_parameter_DOMPoint
    Added to Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  12. api ➞ Window ➞ originAgentCluster
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  13. api ➞ AudioWorklet ➞ port
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  14. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ decreaseZoomLevel
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  15. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ forwardWheel
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  16. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ getSupportedZoomLevels
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  17. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ increaseZoomLevel
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  18. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ resetZoomLevel
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  19. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ zoomLevel
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  20. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ zoomlevelchange_event
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  21. api ➞ GPUAdapterInfo ➞ isFallbackAdapter
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  22. api ➞ IdentityCredential ➞ configURL
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ print-color-adjust ➞ economy
    Added to Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ print-color-adjust ➞ exact
    Added to Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ selectors ➞ details-content
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ dynamic-range-limit ➞ constrained
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. css ➞ properties ➞ dynamic-range-limit ➞ no-limit
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Origin-Agent-Cluster
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ Error ➞ isError
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ RegExp ➞ escape
    Added to Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 20

Show all 20 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (2)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 28 March 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

CSS

  1. css ➞ selectors ➞ after ➞ nested_marker
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ selectors ➞ before ➞ nested_marker
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

New entries (14)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 28 March 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api ➞ AudioWorklet ➞ port
  2. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ decreaseZoomLevel
  3. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ forwardWheel
  4. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ getSupportedZoomLevels
  5. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ increaseZoomLevel
  6. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ resetZoomLevel
  7. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ zoomLevel
  8. api ➞ CaptureController ➞ zoomlevelchange_event
  9. api ➞ GPUAdapterInfo ➞ isFallbackAdapter
  10. api ➞ IdentityCredential ➞ configURL

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ dynamic-range-limit ➞ constrained
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ dynamic-range-limit ➞ no-limit
  3. css ➞ selectors ➞ after ➞ nested_marker
  4. css ➞ selectors ➞ before ➞ nested_marker

Removed entries (4)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Friday, 28 March 2025, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ dynamic-range-limit ➞ constrained-high
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ dynamic-range-limit ➞ high

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Link ➞ compression-dictionary
  2. http ➞ headers ➞ Link ➞ expect
  • Previous report: Monday, 31 March 2025

BCD Watch: A service of

Subscribe: RSS • Atom • JSON

This report was generated by diffing v6.0.1 (Friday, 28 March 2025) and v6.0.3 (Friday, 4 April 2025)
